Articles.Content:
Computer Shopper UK this month has an "Explore Space" article featuring 10 space sites and programmes ranging from following NASA and ISS reports to Orbiter and, of course, KSP :-). Sorry, but I can't find a direct link to the article.

It's a pretty good magazine but specialist-interest so no great news for Squad/KSP but the (short) review itself is good and doesn't have any glaring misconceptions, so there's a good chance the journalists even know what they're talking about, for a change ^^.
